Package ru.clevertec.news.service

Class NewsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ru.clevertec.news.service.NewsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NewsService
@Service public class NewsServiceImpl extends Object implements NewsService
Service implementation for managing news entities. This class provides methods to retrieve, create, update, and archive news items.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich

    • get

      @Cacheable(value="api-cache", key="#id") public NewsResponse get(Long id)
      Retrieves a news item by its ID.
      Specified by:
      get in interface NewsService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the news item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A NewsResponse representing the retrieved news item.
      Throws:
      ru.clevertec.exceptionhandlerstarter.exception.EntityNotFoundException - if the news item is not found or is archived.

    • getFromArchive

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @Cacheable(value="api-cache", key="#id") public NewsResponse getFromArchive(Long id)
      Retrieves an archived news item by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getFromArchive in interface NewsService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the archived news item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A NewsResponse representing the retrieved archived news item.
      Throws:
      ru.clevertec.exceptionhandlerstarter.exception.EntityNotFoundException - if the archived news item is not found or is not archived.

    • create

      @Transactional @Cacheable(value="api-cache", key="#newsDto.title() + #newsDto.text") public NewsResponse create(NewsRequest newsDto)
      Creates a new news item.

      Parameters:

    • update

      @Transactional @CachePut(value="api-cache", key="#id") public NewsResponse update(Long id, NewsRequest newsDto)
      Updates an existing news item.
      Specified by:
      update in interface NewsService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the news item to update.
      newsDto - The NewsRequest containing the updated information for the news item.
      Returns:
      A NewsResponse representing the updated news item.
      Throws:
      ru.clevertec.exceptionhandlerstarter.exception.EntityNotFoundException - if the news item is not found or is archived.

    • archive

      Archives a news item by setting its archived status to true.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the news item to archive.
      Throws:

    • search

      public List<NewsResponse> search(String searchValue, Integer offset, Integer limit)
      Searches for news based on a search value with boosted fields without using Stream. Uses Hibernate Search to perform a search and maps the results to NewsResponse objects.
      Specified by:
      search in interface NewsService
      Parameters:
      searchValue - The value to search for in the "title" and "text" fields.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of results to fetch.
      Returns:
      A List of NewsResponse objects representing the search results.
